com.ivj.squirrelgame.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ivj.squirrelgame.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicEntity, StaticEntity

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class defining a entity for the game with a ID, a energy and a position
    Author:
